title: Guinness Book of World Records 1972
description: Guinness has the answers--the longest, the shortest, the biggest, the smallest, the most costly, the heaviest, the fattest, the thinnest, the fastest, the highest, the earliest, the tallest...the mostest...Boston Globe. It's valid, authoritative...an indispendable book...The New York Times
author: Norris McWhirter
